import"./DashboardLayout.scss";import{Line,Bar,Pie}from'react-chartjs-2';import{Chart as ChartJS,CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,BarElement,ArcElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend}from'chart.js';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";ChartJS.register(CategoryScale,LinearScale,PointElement,LineElement,BarElement,ArcElement,Title,Tooltip,Legend);const dataLine={labels:['January','February','March','April','May'],datasets:[{label:'Line Chart',data:[12,19,3,5,2],borderColor:'#42A5F5',backgroundColor:'rgba(66, 165, 245, 0.2)'}]};const dataBar={labels:['Red','Blue','Yellow','Green','Purple'],datasets:[{label:'Bar Chart',data:[12,19,3,5,2],backgroundColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)','rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)','rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)']}]};const dataPie={labels:['Red','Blue','Yellow'],datasets:[{label:'Pie Chart',data:[300,50,100],backgroundColor:['rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)','rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)','rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)']}]};const dataPareto={labels:['A','B','C','D','E'],datasets:[{label:'Frequency',data:[120,90,60,30,10],backgroundColor:'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',borderColor:'#FF6384',borderWidth:1,yAxisID:'y'},{label:'Cumulative Percentage',data:[20,40,60,80,100],borderColor:'#36A2EB',fill:false,type:'line',yAxisID:'y1'}]};// Tùy chỉnh cấu hình biểu đồ Pareto
const optionsPareto={responsive:true,plugins:{legend:{position:'top'},tooltip:{callbacks:{label:function(context){if(context.dataset.type==='line'){return"".concat(context.dataset.label,": ").concat(context.raw,"%");}return"".concat(context.dataset.label,": ").concat(context.raw);}}}},scales:{y:{type:'linear',position:'left',title:{display:true,text:'Frequency'}},y1:{type:'linear',position:'right',title:{display:true,text:'Cumulative Percentage'},grid:{drawOnChartArea:false},ticks:{callback:function(value){return value+'%';}}}}};function DashboardLayout(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Line,{data:dataLine})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:dataBar})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chart-single",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Pie,{data:dataPie})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Bar,{data:dataPareto,options:optionsPareto})})]})]});}export default DashboardLayout;
